title: Teemo Chrome Skin?
body:
idk if its just me, or if im just too blind to see it, but i had bought the chrome skin for teemo's Cottaintail, and the option for the skin isnt appearing. i first saw this while in aram, so i thought id try it in norms. still didnt see it... it shoud be a color box on the skin right? 
if so, theres nothing..... if theres a different way to select it, could some1 enlighten me?

http://imgur.com/a/dVKsG

replies.body:
Hey!

Sorry to hear you can't select your chroma. D: We're aware of this issue and could use your help to investigate.

Is this happening on the Alpha Client?
Did you purchase this chroma shortly before you tried to use it?
Have you logged out of League since purchasing the chroma?
Have you used the chroma in a game at all so far? If so, which queue?

Download the Hextech Repair Tool so we can collect your air client logs: https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/player-support/tools/Hextech%20Repair%20Tool.msi

Once youâ€™ve run the repair tool, a .zip file will be created on your desktop that includes your logs. Please attach it to your boards post. :)

Thanks! ^-^

hi :>
after the recent update(idk if somethn happened or not)
the chroma option is now appearing and working :>
thank you for your response and concern. much appreciated :D
(do i still need to attach the thing or no?)
If you're good to go now, no need. Thanks so much for the update! :)
